WSUS32 KKCI 300955 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 5C 
VALID UNTIL 1155Z 
TX OK 
FROM 30WNW MLC-10E SPS 
LINE TS 30 NM WIDE MOV FROM 24040KT. TOPS TO FL280. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 301155-301555 
AREA 1...FROM MMB-30WSW OKC-40NE MLC-50NE TXK-40S EIC-30NE 
ABI-AMA-MMB 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
